casebody.data:
Roy E. Keye, by Edward Keye, appellee, v. James D. Roszell, trading as Roszell Ice Cream Company, appellant.Gen. No. 6,615.Action to recover for injuries to boy sustained while hitching on a motor truck. Judgment for plaintiff. Appeal from the Circuit Court of Peoria county; the Hon. John M. Niehaus, Judge, presiding. Heard in this court at the October term, 1918.Reversed.Opinion filed February 8, 1919.

Niehaus, J., took no part.

McRoberts & Morgan, for appellant. Charles S. Stubbles and Elmer J. Slough, for appellee. Mr. Justice Carnes

delivered the opinion of the court.
